channel.title: Some of the items i put on don't look normal (SplitBark, Mystic top)
channel.description:
Some of the items i put on don't look normal (SplitBark, Mystic top)
anyway to fix that?
More items that are bugged:
Monk robe top shade robes, almost all top robes, but ahrims and ghoslty
~Thanks~ Parkview
[font=Verdana]they go in the right slot, but they just appear like, wierd, on the player. Ill get pictures. Its like, you cant see the splitbark ARMS or the MYSTIC ARMES and only see a part of the body, pretty wierd, but the equip. slot is place is fine.[/font]
